fields.descriptive_line:
[Leather panel] Gilt leather panel, decorated with a lozenge-shaped compartment formed by strapwork bands united by roses, and decorated with flowers in gold and silver on a green/blue ground. Within the  compartment is a vase of flowers in blue, gilded and silvered on a red ground, Italy, ca. 1500-1600.

[Panel] Gilt leather border, decorated with interlacing strapwork bands in silver and gold on a red ground, which enclose spaces filled with floral designs, silvered and gilded on a blue ground, Italy, ca. 1500-1600.

[Leather panel] Gilt leather panel, decorated with a lozenge-shaped compartment formed by strapwork bands united by roses, and decorated with flowers in gold and silver on a green/blue ground. Within the compartment is a vase of flowers in blue, gold and silver on a red ground, Italy, ca. 1500-1600.

[Leather panel] Gilt leather panel, decorated with a lozenge-shaped compartment formed by strapwork bands united by roses, and decorated with flowers in gold and silver on a green/blue ground. Within the compartment is a vase of flowers in blue, gold and silver on a red ground, Italy, ca. 1500-1600.
fields.physical_description:
[Leather panel] Gilt leather panel, decorated with a lozenge-shaped compartment formed by strapwork bands united by roses, and decorated with flowers, gilded and silvered on a green/blue ground. Within the  compartment is a vase of flowers in blue, gilded and silvered on a red ground. The gilded and silvered parts have been punched with several small stamps. This panel was part of a large hanging, described originally as: Gilt leather hanging consisting of four panels and two borders at the top. The repeating pattern consists of lozenge-shaped compartments formed by strapwork bands united by roses, and decorated with flowers in gold and silver on a blue ground. These compartments are ornamented with vases of flowers in blue, gold and silver on a red ground. The border has interlacing strapwork bands in silver and gold on a red ground, which enclose spaces filled with floral designs in silver and gold on a blue ground. The whole pattern is further decorated with small stamped diapers. 
[Panel] Gilt leather border, decorated with interlacing strapwork bands in silver and gold on a red ground, which enclose spaces filled with floral designs in silver and gold on a blue ground. The gilded and silvered parts have been punched with several small stamps. This border was part of a large hanging, described originally as: Gilt leather hanging consisting of four panels and two borders at the top. The repeating pattern consists of lozenge-shaped compartments formed by strapwork bands united by roses, and decorated with flowers in gold and silver on a blue ground. These compartments are ornamented with vases of flowers in blue, gold and silver on a red ground. The border has interlacing strapwork bands in silver and gold on a red ground, which enclose spaces filled with floral designs in silver and gold on a blue ground. The whole pattern is further decorated with small stamped diapers. 

[Leather panel] Gilt leather panel, decorated with a lozenge-shaped compartment formed by strapwork bands united by roses, and decorated with flowers, gilded and silvered on a green/blue ground. Within the  compartment is a vase of flowers in blue, gilded and silvered on a red ground. The gilded and silvered parts have been punched with several small stamps. This panel was part of a large hanging, described originally as: Gilt leather hanging consisting of four panels and two borders at the top. The repeating pattern consists of lozenge-shaped compartments formed by strapwork bands united by roses, and decorated with flowers in gold and silver on a blue ground. These compartments are ornamented with vases of flowers in blue, gold and silver on a red ground. The border has interlacing strapwork bands in silver and gold on a red ground, which enclose spaces filled with floral designs in silver and gold on a blue ground. The whole pattern is further decorated with small stamped diapers. 
[Leather panel] Gilt leather panel, decorated with a lozenge-shaped compartment formed by strapwork bands united by roses, and decorated with flowers, gilded and silvered on a green/blue ground. Within the  compartment is a vase of flowers in blue, gilded and silvered on a red ground. The gilded and silvered parts have been punched with several small stamps. This panel was part of a large hanging, described originally as: Gilt leather hanging consisting of four panels and two borders at the top. The repeating pattern consists of lozenge-shaped compartments formed by strapwork bands united by roses, and decorated with flowers in gold and silver on a blue ground. These compartments are ornamented with vases of flowers in blue, gold and silver on a red ground. The border has interlacing strapwork bands in silver and gold on a red ground, which enclose spaces filled with floral designs in silver and gold on a blue ground. The whole pattern is further decorated with small stamped diapers.

fields.bibliography: Rossignoli, Guia. Cuoi d’oro. Corami da tappezzeria, paliotti e cuscini del Museo Stefano Bardini. (Museo Stefano Bardini, 2009) p. 142 fig 124
fields.history_note:
Formerly described as 'Florentine, 16th century'. There is, however, no exact information available (not in Italy or elsewhere) to keep this attribution any longer standing. The whole group of  panels and hangings that were acquired from Bardini were, without any exception, being described in this way, although for instance inventory number 732-1890 has proven to be of a Dutch origin. A photo of this hanging, dd. circa 1885-1890, exists in Museo Bardini, Florence. Information supplied by Eloy Koldeweij, October 1996.

Purchase price of £1000 for a group of leather objects (museum number: 682-1890 to 732-1890).
